data.message: That's amazing! Great job!  I hope you guys are putting together many more side projects like this one!  Keep changing to the world!

replies.message: Thanks for sharing those kind words, Dave! We really appreciate the support of our community. -Jordan
Help the people of Ghana with Solar. We need that very badly.
A great step to bring the world closer with more communication.

Moses Ofori That would be great to get Ghana on full solar power Moses.  I don't know how much help I would be, but Kyocera Solar Energy Group may be able to work with you and your country in developing a strong African manufacturing base.  I did see you guys have some pretty solid coastline and port locations for global and continental shipping.  If you were able to set up a trade agreement with them and divert maybe 10% of profits or even sales into developing a countrywide solar infrastructure, maybe with a little help from the Kyocera Solar Energy Group R&D team, your country might be able to lead the world in solar infrastructure systems.   You do have a small enough country geographically speaking that you would make an excellent test case of converting an entire system into solar and seeing how scale-able it would be.

Dave Wegener 
Hi ,  Could I have your full address  to be forwarded to a Ghanaian resident  for your onward communication, for you to  analyze if  it will be suitable for both  in your establishment
